thread.title: Manchester United star says he has a 'big announcement' to make on Instagram | Metro News
thread.title_full: Manchester United star says he has a 'big announcement' to make on Instagram | Metro News

author: Sean Kearns For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Manchester United star says he has a 'big announcement' to make on Instagram | Metro News
text:
Sean Kearns for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 14 Feb 2017 5:10 pm Michael Carrick has six months to run on his Manchester United contract (Picture: Getty) 
Manchester United midfielder Michael Carrick has teased fans by revealing he has a ‘big announcement’ to make on Instagram. 
The 35-year-old is into his twelfth year at Old Trafford and is out of contract at the end of the season. ‘How can Gibbs be captain?!’ Man Utd legend Roy Keane TEARS into Arsenal flops 
The veteran joined the Red Devils in a £18.6million deal from Tottenham in 2006 and was handed a new one-year deal at the Theatre of Dreams shortly after Jose Mourinho’s arrival. 
Carrick was reinstated into the side in November but he’s been benched more recently. However, he’s teased fans by revealing on his personal Instagram page that he has a ‘big announcement’ to make soon. 
In the first part of Carrick’s Instagram story, the midfielder wrote: ‘Filming today for a big announcement coming soon!!’ 
One of the following photos had the caption: ‘Such a privilege to play for Manchester United’. 
Though it’s unconfirmed at this stage, the announcement could well be that Carrick is set to be handed a testimonial at Old Trafford at the end of this season. 
The midfielder is expected to be granted a testimonial after serving longer than ten years at the club.
